turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi, happy Labor Day. Are you a person who likes to help others?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Happy Labor Day to you as well. Not particularly, I mean I wouldn't ignore an elderly person who fell down in front of me but I don't usually do charity or volunteer work.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Have you heard of the Save The Children foundation?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I have not, what kind of foundation is that?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The organization solicits donations to provide food, shelter and clothing to help children in improvished countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh that sounds good. I bet the foundation takes a huge chunk of the donations though, most of the non-profit CEOs are making crazy money, which really bugs me.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I share your dislike for organizations taking most of the donations. Save the Children turns 98% of donations directly into helping the children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Well that's wonderful to hear, glad to see some organizations are actually doing what they preach so much about.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children now helps over 150,000 children in poor countries saving many lives.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Do they have any specific countries or regions they focus on? Or is it just everywhere on the globe?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: A good share of the help takes place on the African continent.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That makes sense, I can't imagine the living conditions for some of those kids. I've seen pictures of the starving children from down there and it's pretty rough.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Very sad to see. Any chance you would consider donating 50% of what you will earn for completing this hit?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm not sure I could donate that much, I use MTurk to pay bills but I may be able to donate a small portion.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I know any about would be greatly appreciated. Would 10% of your hit earnings be possible?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I guess I could do 10%, it is for the kids after all and the organization does make sure almost all the money goes to them.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you for your donation. I know Save the Children will be very thankful. I am donating 100% of my hit earnings as this is just a means to keep my mind working. Thank you again, you are very kind.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's awesome, your doing the good work! I hope enough of us work on donate for it to make some meaningful difference to the children.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I will do the best I can, again, that you for your help.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Glad to have the opportunity, it feels easier to donate money this way than to take cash out of my wallet and donate it, maybe because it\'s just electronic "cash" right now or something heh.
